title: Hour 1: Must Win?
description:
Chris "Mad Dog" Russo thinks Kansas City needs to get a win on Sunday Night against the Buccaneers. Dominique Foxworthy says the Dolphins have the talent to make a run at the Super Bowl. Plus, the crew debates Stephen A's top 5 NFL teams heading into Week 4. Plus, Mad Dog is not worried about Aaron Judge breaking the AL home run record. Later, Kimberley Martin goes right at Mad Dog for his take on Lamar Jackson.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
